targets.expr:
sum(rate(slack_notifications_processed_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod_name=~"$pod_name", handler=~"$slack_handler"}[$__rate_interval])) by (handler, type)
/
sum(rate(slack_notifications_received_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod_name=~"$pod_name", handler=~"$slack_handler"}[$__rate_interval])) by (handler, type)

sum(rate(cache_gets_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod_name=~"$pod_name", cache=~"$cache", result="hit"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cache)
/
sum(rate(cache_gets_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod_name=~"$pod_name", cache=~"$cache"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cache)
